title: Tesla shares fall 8% in premarket trading after earnings miss
content: Tesla shares dropped in premarket trading in the U.S. after it reported second-quarter earnings that missed expectations.
summary: Tesla shares dropped in premarket trading in the U.S. after it reported second-quarter earnings that missed expectations.

title: World shatters heat record for the second time in just two days
content: The world registered its hottest day on record for the second time in just two days, according to the latest data compiled by the EU's climate monitor.
summary: The world registered its hottest day on record for the second time in just two days, according to the latest data compiled by the EU's climate monitor.

title: Britain's King Charles cashes in as Crown Estate profits surge to over $1.4 billion
content: Britain's King Charles is set for a bumper £45 million ($58 million) pay raise after profits at the sovereign's public estate more than doubled, according to official records.
summary: Britain's King Charles is set for a bumper £45 million ($58 million) pay raise after profits at the sovereign's public estate more than doubled, according to official records.

title: Deutsche Bank shares drop 6% after lender snaps 15-quarter profit streak
content: Net loss attributable to shareholders was 143 million euros ($155.1 million), against an LSEG poll of analysts which had predicted a loss of 145 million euros.
summary: Net loss attributable to shareholders was 143 million euros ($155.1 million), against an LSEG poll of analysts which had predicted a loss of 145 million euros.

title: World's largest luxury group LVMH slumps 4% after second-quarter revenue miss

title: Trump 2.0 could go 'nuclear' on China trade, while economists say Harris would remain tough
content: Economists and trade experts largely expect Trump would further cut and destabilize trade relations between the world's two largest economies.

title: Spain's Santander posts 20% hike in net profit as retail business shines
content: Banco Santander posted a 20% year-on-year hike in second-quarter net profit underpinned by growth in its retail, wealth and consumer activity.
